text: Ne(yitsulila) Olwa Nyasaye wuwo olwa yabukula mubandu okhurula mubo mulwibulo lwabu, mana nabakhola abaloli khumioyo chiabu abeene. (naboola);” Koo isie shendi Nyasaye wenyu?” Nibaboola mbu “Eeh- khurusia obuloli mbu (Ewe oli Nyasaye wefu)” Nyasaye nababoolela mbu ; “Muletsa okhuboola inyanga yeyindukho mbu efwe khwali khung’ang’alile tawe
